name: RightGift
tag_list: gift-registry, online-registry, registry, social-wishlist, weddings, share, wish-list
overview:
RightGift was created to take the guess work out of gift giving for any specialist occasion.

RightGift.com was created out of necessity while trying to purchase the perfect first anniversary gift. With so many life events and gift giving opportunities, your friends and family will always get you something that you really want or need. Since RightGift.com was developed with life events in mind, users are able to add their friends and family so they can view your personal RightGift.com profile via email and multiple social networking site accounts. Users will never have to return the wrong size sweater or keep an unwanted gift in the closet just to take it out when the gifter comes for a visit. You will always receive the Right Gift!

Users can also suggest that their friends and loved ones register at RightGift.com. Everyone can be sure they are always giving the Right Gift. With anniversaries, weddings, baby showers, birthdays, Motherâ€™s and Fatherâ€™s day, Christmas, Hanukkah, graduations, house warming parties, small impromptu get together or charitable giving, there is always a friend or family member that deserves the Right Gift!

RightGift.com has partnered with many of your favorite online retailers to make sure you give and receive the RightGift. Directly on our site in the catalog section, it is easy to add items to your personal RightGift.com wishlist. If the item you are looking for is not available through our catalog, we have developed the RightGift.com Bookmarklet which allows users to save items with ease to their personal wishlist while shopping online at any store.

Connecting the link between gifting and event planning, RightGift.com has built-in an “Events” section where you can create invitations for any special occasion such as birthday party or baby shower with associated wishlist items and track your invited guests’ RSVPs. In addition, to make planning any event easier, you can specify items needed to help you host any special occasion - small or large - from a tail gate party to a New Yearâ€™s Eve celebration! Requesting and knowing that you will have all the necessary items from paper plates to food and drinks for any event makes event planning enjoyable and easy. Let RightGift.com help you plan that special event by sending invitations along with a link to your wishlist.
